slides.title: OSRS Region Analyzer
slides.description: A detailed web app for analyzing region data in the game Old School RuneScape, including bosses, skilling activities, item resources, best-in-slot gear, questlines, and more.

slides.title: Zigurous
slides.description: Zigurous is an indie game development studio. Adam has designed and managed the website since he founded the game studio in 2012 and continously iterates on the design year after year. Below you can see different examples and progression of the website over time.
slides.description_short: Zigurous is an indie game development studio. Adam has designed and managed the website since he founded the game studio in 2012 and continously iterates on the design year after year.

slides.title: Colorly
slides.description: Colorly is a versatile collection of color tools for designers and developers encapsulated in one web app - shades, tints, tones, harmonies, contrast, color blindness, gradients, and more!
slides.description_short: Colorly is a versatile collection of color tools for designers and developers encapsulated in one web app - shades, tints, tones, harmonies, contrast, color blindness, gradients, and more!

slides.title: Polykai
slides.description: Polykai is a dark color scheme for code editors inspired by Wimer Hazenberg's Monokai theme. The theme is supported in 20+ code editors and terminals, including a custom VS Code extension.
slides.description_short: Polykai is a dark color scheme for code editors inspired by Wimer Hazenberg's Monokai theme. The theme is supported in 20+ code editors and terminals, including a custom VS Code extension.

slides.title: Allium
slides.description_short: Allium is a home-based floral design studio launched in 2013 by Kim Stanke. After years of working in both retail stores and special event design shops, Kim started her own business to flex her creative muscles.

slides.title: DemonTHON
slides.description_short: DemonTHON is a year-long fundraising organization benefiting Ann & Robert H. Lurie Children's Hospital of Chicago that culminates in a 24-hour Dance Marathon at DePaul University.

slides.title: Be Super
slides.description: Be Super strives to use comic book characters as educational tools to understand social justice issues. A movement calling for everyone to be the hero within. Adam designed Be Super's website to help promote the cause.
slides.description_short: Be Super strives to use comic book characters as educational tools to understand social justice issues. A movement calling for everyone to be the hero within.

slides.title: Ashantis Jones
slides.description: Ashantis Jones is an event planner from Cleaveland, Ohio that entertains and creates memorable events through detail oriented design and calculated execution. Adam designed Ashantis's portfolio to assist in her job hunt as a graduate of the BFA Theatre Management at DePaul University looking for opportunities in the event management space.
slides.description_short: Ashantis Jones is an event planner from Cleaveland, Ohio that entertains and creates memorable events through detail oriented design and calculated execution.

slides.title: Margaret Baughman
slides.description: Director, choreographer, and empathetic human, Margaret Baughman is enchanted by a world of contradictions that allows her to shake up perspectives through theatre, advocacy, and impeccable organization. Adam designed Margaret's portfolio to help showcase her work.
slides.description_short: Director, choreographer, and empathetic human, Margaret Baughman is enchanted by a world of contradictions that allows her to shake up perspectives through theatre, advocacy, and impeccable organization.

slides.title: Taylor Cochran Music
slides.description_short: Taylor Cochran is a singer/songwriter from Nashville, Tennessee who started pursuing his songwriting career in early 2013. Through his music, he aspires to send a message of joy, hope, and love.

slides.title: Squish-em!
slides.description_short: Squish-em! is a simple whack-a-mole arcade game designed for mobile devices. The website is a one-page, artistic cover designed to promote the game and direct users to download the mobile app.

slides.title: Let It Beard
slides.description_short: Let It Beard is an animated short film that follows the misadventures of an enigmatic religious family known as "The Cult". The Captain and his devoted followers aim for truth, inner peace, and run various endeavors on their path to enlightenment.
